title: LENTit
description: LENTit is a revolutionary platform for renting and thrifting fashion & lifestyle items. It aims to solve fashion sustainability issues innovatively. The startup focuses on AI, AR, and web/app development to enhance user experience.
tagline: Revolutionizing fashion sustainability through AI & AR.

title: College Dilao
description: College Dilao is an education counseling platform helping students choose the best-fit colleges and prepare for competitive exams. It also provides detailed, unbiased reviews of colleges and courses.
tagline: Guiding students toward the best educational choices.

title: IntEarn
description: IntEarn is a startup focused on connecting MSMEs with student talent, providing valuable growth opportunities for both businesses and interns.
tagline: Empowering students and MSMEs through meaningful internships.

title: Miiorra Novelty
description: Miiorra Novelty is an e-commerce fashion startup specializing in high-quality sterling silver jewelry at affordable prices. It aims to make luxury jewelry accessible through social media platforms.
tagline: Making luxury jewelry affordable and accessible.

title: Zinovaa
description: Zinovaa is a fast and reliable clothing delivery service that brings outfits to your doorstep within 30 minutes or the same day. Ideal for last-minute fashion needs.
tagline: Fast and reliable fashion delivery at your doorstep.

title: PeerMart
description: PeerMart is a growing platform empowering users to buy and sell pre-owned items seamlessly. It promotes sustainability by making second-hand shopping effortless.

title: nexCRAFT
description: nexCRAFT is an IT consultancy providing customized web and app development services. It works with startups and businesses to build innovative digital solutions.
tagline: Customized IT solutions for startups and businesses.

title: CitizenSphere
description: CitizenSphere is a startup creating a citizen-government-centric social media platform. It aims to bridge communication gaps between citizens and government agencies using AI.
tagline: Bridging the gap between citizens and governments through AI.

title: Indishreshtha Private Limited
description: Indishreshtha is a personal care company reviving Ayurvedic wisdom for modern lifestyles. It develops innovative beauty and wellness products inspired by India's heritage.
tagline: Modern wellness through ancient Ayurvedic wisdom.

title: SYNC (RSYNC Global Solutions Private Limited)
description: SYNC is a mobility platform empowering university students and faculty with safer, smarter, and more cost-effective transportation solutions, including carpooling.
tagline: Smart and cost-effective mobility for university students.

title: Openzo Softcorp Pvt Ltd
description: Openzo is a hyper-local convenience platform digitizing local businesses, enabling online orders, and facilitating last-mile delivery fulfillment.
tagline: Digitizing local businesses with seamless online convenience.

title: Vrdionx
description: Vrdionx is developing eco-friendly, biodegradable leather materials using innovative plant-based technologies, reducing reliance on toxic synthetic materials.

title: BitbyBit
description: BitbyBit is a mutual fund investment app designed for first-time investors, millennials, and young professionals, encouraging systematic investments.
tagline: Simplifying mutual fund investments for young investors.

title: ShowSeeker
description: ShowSeeker aims to revolutionize the way entertainment content is discovered and shared, providing an intuitive platform for users.
tagline: Redefining how entertainment content is discovered and shared.

title: Edtech
description: We are a fast-growing edtech startup focused on making learning more engaging and visually impactful. Our team ensures that our platform delivers high-quality content that enhances learning experiences.
tagline: Engaging and visually impactful learning experiences.

title: Giggll
description: Gigglle is a one-of-a-kind mobile app platform designed exclusively for kids aged 3-15 to help them discover, nurture, and showcase their talents in a safe digital space. From art, singing, and music to acting and dance, we enable young talents to flourish while ensuring the safest online experience through AI-powered content filtration, parental controls, and strict content moderation.
tagline: A safe and creative platform for young talents.

title: CareEase
description: CareEase Homecare Services Pvt. Ltd. is a tech-enabled home healthcare marketplace that connects patients with verified caregivers, nurses, and hospitals for home-based medical services. Our platform ensures affordable, transparent, and high-quality healthcare services at home by allowing users to search, compare, and book caregivers based on their specific needs and location. We aim to bridge the gap between caregivers and patients, providing an easy, secure, and reliable solution for home healthcare needs.
tagline: Connecting patients with verified home healthcare providers.
